meaning list.sentence: The teacher laid into the student for not completing the assignment.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nibedy ilay mpianatra noho ny tsy fanaovana ny entimody ny mpampianatra.

meaning list.sentence: The rain didn’t let up all day.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tsy nitsahatra ny orana nandritra ny tontolo andro.

meaning list.sentence: He didn’t let up until the project was complete.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tsy naka aina izy raha tsy vita ny tetikasa.

meaning list.sentence: He lived off his savings for several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nandritra ny volana maromaro dia nivelona tamin’ny fanangonam-bolany izy.

meaning list.sentence: He looks down on people who don’t have a degree.
meaning list.sentence translation: Manambany olona tsy manana diplaoma izy.

meaning list.sentence: She looked him up and down before speaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nojereny ambony sy ambany izy vao niteny.

meaning list.sentence: We passed through a small town on our way to the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: Namakivaky tanàna kely iray izahay teny an-dalana ho any an-tendrombohitra.

meaning list.sentence: He passed through the city for a conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nijanona vetivety tao an-tanàna nandritra ny fihaonambe.

meaning list.sentence: The media played up the risks of the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nanitatra ny loza ateraky ny teknolojia vaovao ny haino aman-jery.

meaning list.sentence: My back has been playing up again.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nanomboka niteraka olana indray ny lamosiko.

meaning list.sentence: She popped in to say hello on her way to work.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nijanona teo izy niarahaba teny an-dalana ho any am-piasana.

meaning list.sentence: Despite the challenges, they pushed ahead with their plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: Na dia teo aza ny fahasahiranana, dia nanohy nandroso tamin'ny drafitra nataony izy ireo.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Raha tsy nijery izy dia nisy nangalatra ny kitapony ary nitsoaka.

meaning list.sentence: They set off on their trip early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nanomboka ny diany vao maraina izy ireo.

meaning list.sentence: The venue was set up for the wedding reception.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nomanina ny toerana hanaovana ny lanonana mariazy.

meaning list.sentence: We had to sit through a very boring lecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tsy maintsy niaritra lahateny mankaleo be izahay.

meaning list.sentence: True friends will always stick by you.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tsy hivadika aminao foana ny tena namana.

meaning list.meaning: Manomboka mandany fotoana amin'ny zavatra na olona iray
meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Taorian'ny nifindrany tao an-tanàna, dia nanomboka nandany fotoana niaraka tamin'ny vondrona namana vaovao izy.
